title: Final Axiomatic State Validation (FASV)
description: Schema ensuring the completeness and structural integrity of the Axiomatic State Manifest (ASM) immediately prior to S11 P-01 evaluation.

TEMM.description: Total Execution Metric Measure (Must be calculated in S08).

UFRM.description: Utility Function Required Minimum (Must be loaded in S02.1).

CFTM.description: Contingency Finality Threshold Margin (Must be loaded in S02.1).

ECVM.description: Environmental Context Verification Status (Must be fulfilled in S06).

PVLM.description: Policy Veto Lock Manifest status (Must be updated in S03).

MPAM.description: Metric Prohibition Act Manifest status (Must be updated in S04).

ADTM.description: Anomaly Detection Trap Manifest status (Must be updated in S09).
